entries: Profane energies twist your weapons, filling them with rage toward everything good. For 1 minute, your weapons and unarmed attacks gain the {@item unholy} weapon rune while you hold them. If a weapon is at its limit on property runes, you can choose one property rune on the weapon to go dormant while the {@item unholy} rune takes effect. In addition, successful {@action strike||Strikes} your allies make while they're within 30 feet of you deal 1 additional evil damage.
